article.title: How GDPR Helped Make My Side Project Possible
article.author: Eric Bai
article.excerpt: In my last post, I shared my first data viz project, ChatStats. Here I'll share a behind-the-scenes story about how the EU's General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) allowed me to create ChatStats.

authors.bio: A Canadian software engineer in New York. I watch a lot of movies.
authors.name: Eric Bai
